channel.description: Recent content in Notes on r4sso.github.io

item.title: Arch Linux: Cleanup
item.description: Clean pkg cache List packages 1ls /var/cache/pacman/pkg/ | less Remove all pkg except those installed 1sudo pacman -Sc Remove all files 1sudo pacman -Scc Or with yay 1yay -Scc Remove unused packages List unused 1sudo pacman -Qtdq Remove unused 1sudo pacman -R $(pacman -Qtdq) Journal logs 1sudo journalctl --vacuum-time=2d This will remove log older than 2 days, you can change accordingly. Clear journal log older than x day/month/year 1sudo journalctl --vacuum-size=100M Restrict logs to a certain size Clean home cache cache is located in ~/.

item.title: tools

item.title: links
item.description: Collection of links. Useful links Title Description GTFOBins A curated list of Unix binaries that can be exploited by an attacker to bypass local security restrictions CyberChef A s1imple, intuitive web app for carrying out all manner of “cyber” operations within a web browser. Payloads All The Things A list of useful payloads and bypass for Web Application Security and Pentest/CTF

item.title: Arch Linux Install (Hyprland)
item.description: Installation My arch linux installation. Archinstall [minimal]: Details Compositor : Hyprland Notifications : dunst Bar : eww Terminal : kitty File-manager : thunar Launcher : rofi My dotfiles availabe on (github) yay Notes: Run as user NOT ROOT! 1git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/yay 2cd yay 3makepkg -si FOR NVIDIA: hyprland-nvidia-git Packages yay -S hyprland eww-wayland dunst polkit-gnome qt5-wayland qt6-wayland \ kitty ttf-iosevka 1yay -S hyprland-bin polkit-gnome ffmpeg neovim viewnior \ 2rofi pavucontrol thunar starship wl-clipboard wf-recorder \ 3swaybg grimblast-git ffmpegthumbnailer tumbler playerctl \ 4noise-suppression-for-voice thunar-archive-plugin kitty \ 5waybar-hyprland wlogout swaylock-effects pamixer \ 6nwg-look-bin nordic-theme papirus-icon-theme dunst Configuration Wrapping the launcher 1#!
